<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby's project
</h1>

Site is running at https://bartlomiejkedziora.github.io/great-gatsby/

## Technologies

Layout and functionality is built with GatsbyJS supported with Bootstrap.
Hero slider is built with SwiperJS library.
Gallery lightbox built with Simple React Lightbox.

## Design

Design thanks to ADream Group https://adream.pl/en/
